modName: Cutting Room Floor - Remove Alteration Armor Effect
summary: Changing the alteration armor effect brought by cutting room floor back to the vanilla effect
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Cutting Room Floor is a mod that I enjoy very much. (Link: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47327/?]Cutting Room Floor[/url])[/size]

[size=3]However, I am not really a fan of the alteration armor effect this mod provided
(which makes characters look hideous). [/size]

[size=4]This tiny patch [u]removes the weird-looking alteration armor effect and restores the vanilla visual effect[/u],
[/size][size=3]offering a solution for people who share the same feeling as me.[/size]

[size=3]The 1.1.0 version now removed Unofficial Skyrim Patch master dependency and added "Cutting Room Floor.esp" as master. [/size]
[size=3]In other words,
[/size][u][size=4]the 1.1.0 version should be compatible with[/size][/u][u][size=4] Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch and other unofficial patches.[/size][/u]
[size=3][color=#ff0000]Full credit of this version gives to user theicedevil[/color].[/size]

[size=3]Remainder: [i]LOAD THIS PATCH AFTER CUTTING ROOM FLOOR
[/i][/size]
author: soching1
